original: BELLANDER, Nils Bertil, Civilingenjör, Skövde, f Sthlm 15/9 06 av reg.läk N B o Adéle Asplund, gm Karin Ohlsson. Studex Sthlm 27, KTH (maskinbyggn o mek tekn) 28—32. Anst Kockums Mek Verkst AB Malmö 33—34, Husqvarna Vapenfabr AB 34, Sv Tryckeri AB Sthlm 34—35, Ahlafors Nya Spinneri AB Nol 35—36, AB Skandiavkn Lysekil 36—37, AB Lindholmens Varv Gbg 37—42, AB Volvo-Pentavkn Skövde sed. 42. Handlagt fråg rör vården av krigsmtrl i Stat ind.komm 40, arméing m kapt tj.ställn v öl reg 40. Resor: Engl 30, Tyskl 37. Led SHT sed. 32.
translated: BELLANDER, Nils Bertil, Civil Engineer, Skövde, born in Stockholm on September 15, 1906, son of regimental doctor N.B. and Adéle Asplund, married Karin Ohlsson. Studied at Stockholm University from 1927 to 1932, and at the Royal Institute of Technology (department of mechanical engineering) from 1928 to 1932. Employed at Kockums Mekaniska Verkstads AB in Malmö from 1933 to 1934, Husqvarna Vapenfabrik AB in 1934, Sv Tryckeri AB in Stockholm from 1934 to 1935, Ahlafors Nya Spinneri AB in Nol from 1935 to 1936, AB Skandiavkn in Lysekil from 1936 to 1937, AB Lindholmens Varv in Gothenburg from 1937 to 1942, and AB Volvo-Pentavkn in Skövde since 1942. Handled matters related to the care of war materials in the State Industrial Committee in 1940, served in the army with the rank of captain in 1940. Traveled to England in 1930 and to Germany in 1937. Has been a member of the Swedish Society for Technology and Shipping since 1932.

structured.name: Nils Bertil Bellander
